question: The ninth Nation’s Cup Boxing Tournament, at which India won six medals, was held in which country?
explanation:
The ninth Nation’s Cup Boxing Tournament was held in the city of Sombor, Serbia. India finished the tournament with an impressive haul of six medals, including four silver and two bronze.
Monika, Ritu Grewal, M Meena Kumari and Bhagyabati won silver medals for India, under the categories of 48 kg, 51 kg, 54 kg and 75 kg respectively. Though all the four Indians were qualified for and contested the final bout for gold, they settled for silver medals. Other Indian boxers, Pavitra and Basumatary Pwilao won a bronze medal each.
